name: tsql
description: A type-safe SQL query builder and database toolkit for TypeScript

scripts.build:js: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm --external '*' && bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format cjs --external '*' --outfile index.cjs && bun build ./src/cli.ts --outdir ./dist --target node --format esm --external '*' && bun build ./src/codegen/index.ts --outdir ./dist/codegen --target node --format esm --external '*' && bun build ./src/codegen/index.ts --outdir ./dist/codegen --target node --format cjs --external '*' --outfile index.cjs
scripts.build: bun run build:js && bun run build:types
scripts.postbuild: chmod +x dist/cli.js && mkdir -p dist/codegen && cp dist/codegen/index.js dist/codegen/ 2>/dev/null || :
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run typecheck && bun run build
